page.title: 14A Typical Day cont.
page.content: During the afternoon we work at many different things.We often have indoor P.E.or if it is sunny we play rounders,which we all enjoy.We also listen to stories or write our own,as well as studying different countries and life long ago.My most enjoyable time is when we have art and my best day is when we have the computer in the room.We go home at half past three. As soon as I reach home I change my uniform for play clothes.If it is raining I stay in and read or watch the television,otherwise I go out to play with my friends or we go to club. I have my tea about half past six then I usually stay in and watch television.If I'm lucky I go to my friend's house and we play games on the computer.I'm usually in bed by half past eight and asleep by nine.
